LanguageData.MLRP_AboutSweetieBotMechLetterText:
Sweetie Bot mechanoids are fast moving with decent sharp armour, but they are vulnerable when engaged in melee combat.

They are best suited for attacking an enemy's flanks, rushing in and laying down fire before retreating to a safe distance.

They can also be used as mounts when part of caravans.
